enhanced_description: HR Mantra is a comprehensive and integrated Human Resources Management System (HRMS) designed to streamline and simplify all HR operations, from staffing and induction to payroll and appraisals. As India's pioneering HR software offered 'as a service' and delivered through a single web-based application, it effectively eliminates redundant data entries, resulting in significant time savings and improved efficiency. The platform is equipped with an AI-driven voicebot and supports millions of configurable policies, alongside multi-lingual, multi-currency, and multi-timezone capabilities, making it a robust solution for global enterprises. Its advanced payroll module manages global payroll and Full & Final Settlement (FFS) processing, encompassing workflows for loans, income tax, and flexible benefit plans. HR Mantra also provides a dedicated mobile application for employees, featuring a 'Get Social' function for communication, and enabling management to track field employees in real-time via GPS. With over 40 pre-provided workflows and the flexibility to create custom workflows and forms, HR Mantra ensures complete customization to meet diverse business needs and industries, while also supporting quality certifications. It is designed to improve employee happiness and engagement and serves businesses of all sizes, from small to large and global enterprises.
